text: "Legs" is a 1984 song by ZZ Top and is the fourth single from their eighth studio album Eliminator. It went to number 8 in the United States, number 16 in the United Kingdom, number 19 in the Netherlands, number 7 in New Zealand, number 9 in Ireland and Canada and number 6 in Australia. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Nickelback songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Synth-pop songs
title: Legs (song)
